edu.columbia.cs.api
Interface RelationshipExtractor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClassifierBasedRelationshipExtractor, PatternBasedRelationshipExtractor
public interface RelationshipExtractor

Interface for Relationship Extractor

A class that implements this interface is responsible for extracting tuples from documents. The method responsible for this task is the extractTuples method.

Since:
2011-09-27
Version:
0.1
Author:
Pablo Barrio, Goncalo Simoes

Method Summary
 java.util.List<Relationship> extractTuples(Document d)
          Given an input document d this method is responsible for extracting all the relationships between entities of the document
 

Method Detail

extractTuples

java.util.List<Relationship> extractTuples(Document d)
Given an input document d this method is responsible for extracting all the relationships between entities of the document

Parameters:
d - the document that contains the information to be extracted
Returns:
a list of relationships between entities present in the document d
